definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: qi4 rong2 jiao1 zhen1 cha2 yi2

sentences.english: Study on relationship between extinction coefficient and mass concentration.
sentences.chinese: 气溶胶消光系数与质量浓度的相关性研究。

sentences.english: The study provides scientific basis for exploring aerosol immunity of Hantavirus.
sentences.chinese: 这为研究汉坦病毒的气溶胶免疫提供了科学依据。

sentences.english: Only small total volumes of liquid aerosols can be expected to reach the distal portions of the tracheobronchial tree.
sentences.chinese: 只有很少一部分液状气溶胶可达到细末支气管。

sentences.english: Instead of using an aerosol freshening spray, mist your room with real citrus scent, .
sentences.chinese: 用天然甘橘气味剂代替气溶胶清新喷雾剂。

sentences.english: Sea salt source contribution to the coast aerosol increased with the diameter of particulate.
sentences.chinese: 海盐源对气溶胶的贡献随气溶胶粒径增大而增加。

sentences.english: Sea salt source contribution to the coast aerosol increased with the diameter of particulate.
sentences.chinese: 海盐源对气溶胶的贡献随气溶胶粒径增大而增加。

sentences.english: The third one will show you the aerosol optical inversion algorithm in sparse vegetation region.
sentences.chinese: 第三章介绍了稀疏植被区域气溶胶光学厚度反演算法。

sentences.english: The size distribution of aerosol follows unimodal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 气溶胶粒子浓度谱为单峰分布。

sentences.english: The sulphur aerosols are actually preventing some warming from taking place currently.
sentences.chinese: 含硫气溶胶实际上一定程度防止了变暖。

sentences.english: The chlorofluoromethanes are used principally in aerosol spray cans and as refrigerants .
sentences.chinese: 氯氟甲烷主要使用在气溶胶喷雾罐和作为冷冻剂。

sentences.english: The daughter nuclides of radon and thoron tend to become attached.
sentences.chinese: 氡和钍射气的子体易被气溶胶吸附。
积雨云中的水珠在气溶胶附近形成。

sentences.english: The absorption of cloud droplets and aerosol is included in the computation.
sentences.chinese: 计算中包括云滴与气溶胶的吸收作用。

sentences.english: The vertical distribution and diurnal variation law of the bioaerosol concentration in Nanjing City.
sentences.chinese: 南京市生物气溶胶浓度垂直分布和日变化规律。

sentences.english: Natural aerosols are the most common condensation nuclei in pristine environments.
sentences.chinese: 自然环境中非人为产生的气溶胶是最常见的云凝结核。

sentences.english: There are many sources of aerosols, including smoke and pollution from human activities.
sentences.chinese: 气溶胶的来源有很多，包括烟雾和人类活动的污染。

definition: aerosol/spray/mist/splattered drops/spray from sneeze or saliva
to breathe in/to suck in/to inhale
